attributes.action: Dismiss MPs found to be fraudently claiming public funds with Gross Misconduct.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not enough to simply pay back these funds to reinstate public opinion, all MPs found to have been claiming public money, should be dismissed with gross misconduct, and also pay back all monies.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
